title: NJDOC Policies and Procedures Regarding Transgender, Intersex and Non-Binary Inmates & Facility Handbooks

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New Jersey Open Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

* The most current version of NJ Department of Corrections policies and procedures regarding transgender, intersex and non-binary inmates. 

* The Inmate Handbook for New Jersey State Prison.

* The Inmate Handbook for Bayside State Prison.

* The Inmate Handbook for Northern State Prison.

* The Inmate Handbook for South Woods State Prison.

* The Inmate Handbook for East Jersey State Prison.

* The Inmate Handbook for Garden State Youth Correctional Facility.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ellie Lightfoot

communications.subject: Michigan Freedom of Information Act Request: Hagerman settlement
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of any settlements between the Hagermans and the City of Detroit resolving its lawsuit (case number 20-001894-CZ).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Aaron Mondry

communications.subject: Michigan Freedom of Information Act Request: Settlement with Kefallinos
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The consent agreement between the City of Detroit and Dennis Kefallinos resolving various nuisance lawsuits filed by the city. The agreement was approved by City Council on Feb. 25.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Aaron Mondry
